Lykke Group

  • Healthcare

Lykke Capital’s Healthcare practice helps navigate the challenges of rare diseases.

A trusted partner to 15+ leading life sciences companies, who continue to work with us year-over-year.

Vectors

We provide a comprehensive and end-to end supporting services for patients and caregivers. By combining human touch with superior technology, we enable patients, caregivers, patient advocacy groups, physicians and pharma companies better navigate the inherent challenges of rare diseases.

  • Physician Vector

    We provide end-to-end consulting covering strategy, operations and tactical processes for your day-to-day operations

  • Patient Vector

    Assisting patients and patient advocacy groups so that the much-needed drugs are made available to patients at affordable costs

  • Pharma Vector

    Using AI/ML to support pharma companies’ at every stage of their drug’s commercial journey – from preclinical to post launch

Solutions

We research and analyze global sustainability, investment, and healthcare trends to provide our clients with the insight they need to make informed decisions about how to invest, operate, and innovate in a sustainable manner.

  • Assessing Value Proposition

    We help avoid costly and avoidable mistakes by doing market opportunity assessment, data landscape review, find right opportunity points and ultimately prevent disappointing sales.

  • Optimize Patient Finding

    We do both qualitative and quantitative market research so you can develop the products and patients can receive the drugs at affordable rates.

  • Forecasting Sales and Volume

    There is no bigger fear than miscalculating or inaccurately calculating your sales. We apply advanced analytics to provide robust framework for structuring the sales sheets for you.
